name: Celestial Guard
short: Improves the efficiency of focus fire
desc: Ships that are not the flagship deal +{%s} damage when attacking units targeted by the flagship

name: Preemptive Strike
short: Improves the capability of enemy shipsystems
desc: All ranged shipsystems of hostile ships have +{%s} to their range

name: Loss of Hope
short: Without the Legion, what do we have left?
desc: All ships in the fleet have their {CR} reduced by {%s}，but every{%s}friendly fleets reduces this effect by {%s}
